name: Pat the Zombie
description:
This is the game where you can pat Kureiji Ollie the zombie idol gently, using A and D button.

If you don't know who Kureiji Ollie is, I greatly suggest you to visit her youtube channel and enjoy her contents. ✨ SPECIAL THANKS TO <a href="https://twitter.com/DonaRingoAme" target="_blank">DONA</a> FOR HELPING ON THE VARIABLE!! ✨
